meanings.sent1: I accidentally borked my phone screen by dropping it.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic borked the engine while trying to fix it.
meanings.sent3: I borked the cake I was baking, but it still tasted good.
meanings.sent4: The storm borked the tree, leaving it split in half.
meanings.sent5: She borked the vase, shattering it into many pieces.

meanings.definition: Not functioning properly or as intended
meanings.sent1: The borked computer screen displayed only a black screen.
meanings.sent2: The borked printer kept jamming the paper.
meanings.sent3: The borked alarm clock went off at midnight instead of morning.
meanings.sent4: The borked door lock refused to open with the key.
meanings.sent5: The borked flashlight flickered on and off unpredictably.
